artist: Artist: Auguste Louis Lepère; Publisher: Edmond Sagot
description: air balloon, ULC; many people rushing toward balloon from hill in foreground; view down into valley with trees in middle ground and buildings in background
inscription:
Signature, Title, Edition, Inscription and Stamp

LLC, in pencil: [DVC] and [59-146]; on back, in pencil: [A77593], [147] and [Casey]
markings: LRC, impressed in paper: [ED. SAGOT / Editeur / PARIS]; LRC, in pencil: [3/35]
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 1996; sold in April for TRT, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1996-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil: [A Lepere]; on back, in pencil: [Le ballon qui tombe]
title: The Falling Balloon, in Pre-Saint-Gervais
